charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1101_0100_20:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] bumped into
Riley and Lucario training hard in a cave...
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_0401_0400_10: Haha, I see you’re full of energy.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_0401_0500_10:
Glad to see another sync pair working hard at
their training!
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_0302_0600_10: I just felt like coming here.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_0402_0700_10:
That might mean you have the ability to
sense auras.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_0402_0800_10:
Maybe you were drawn here because you sensed
Lucario’s aura...
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_0900_10:
The environment here is similar to a place in
Sinnoh called Iron Island.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1000_10: Lucario and I always used to train there.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1100_10:
Perhaps that’s why I was led to Pasio by some
mysterious power...
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1200_10:
In any case, I always seem to find myself coming
to this place.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1300_10: Honestly, it’s become a part of my daily routine.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1400_10:
There are a lot of sync pairs on Pasio with strong
auras.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1500_10: I have to train harder so I don’t lose to them.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1700_10: Have I told you about auras before?
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1800_10:
An aura is essentially a vibration that emanates
from one’s heart or soul.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_1900_10: You could say it expresses a person’s strength.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_2000_10: Lucario can sense auras from far away.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_2100_10:
It can also sense the opponent’s feelings or read
their thoughts.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_2200_10:
I can also read auras, though not as adeptly as
Lucario.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_2300_10:
We’re both deeply interested in your aura,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_0402_2700_10:
It’s...loud, and makes me want to learn more
about what kind of Trainer you are.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_2800_10:
By reading a person’s aura, I can tell what kind of
heart they have.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_2900_10: Your aura has yet to be imbued with anything.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_3000_10:
It seems your heart is still developing—rocked by
feelings born from your endeavor to understand
others.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_3100_10: I think you have a very fascinating aura!
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_3200_10: This must be difficult to understand.
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_3300_10:
If only you knew how to sense the auras of
yourself and others...
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_3400_10: Actually, we’d be happy to train you!
charaepi_ch0156_00_gen/2301_1201_3500_10:
If you could deepen your understanding of
auras, that would make us happy!
